bike.description: C15 ultra high-modulus carbon w/ High Compaction Molding System, integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, oversized PIIS BB86 shell, double water bottle mounts
sizes: S (44cm), S/M (47cm), M (50cm), M/L (53cm), L (55cm), L/XL (58cm)

components.description: C15 ultra high-modulus carbon thin seatstays, oversized chainstays, carbon dropout w/ replaceable hanger
FC-330 carbon monocoque w/ tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Shimano Dura Ace press-fit BB86 sealed bearing
Oval 733 aero alloy clincher, 33mm rim - 700c, tubeless ready
Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick, 150 tpi, 700c x 23mm, folding
FSA Orbit C-40, 1 1/8" upper - 1 1/2" lower, integrated w/ carbon top cover
Oval R700 w/ CrMo-Ti hollow rails
